channel.title: Send Message Every 5 Mins

}

item.title: Send Message Every 5 Mins

item.description:

I think the boolean process is wrong. Can you tell me what to find because what I posted that is what I did this:

[code]public boolean process() { specialRestoreTimer -= 1; // is being called regularily every 500ms

if(server.yellToEveryone == 1){
yellToEveryone = 300;
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Testing every 5 minutes”;
}
if (clicktimer > 0)
{
clicktimer-=1;
}

if(clicktimer == 0) {
if(clicks >= 9999999) {
if(warn == 0) {
sendMessage(“NO MASS CLICKING ALLOWED!”);
warn = 1;[/code]

Im getting errors right now.

item.title: Send Message Every 5 Mins
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Add this in server.java

public static int yellToEveryone = 500;

And in server.java search for process

In there add
if(yellToEveryone > 0){
yellToEveryone -= 1;
}

Now in boolean process (client.java) add
if(server.yellToEveryone == 1){
yellToEveryone = 500;
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “GO TO FORUMSHERE.COM”;
}

Read full topic
